definitions.definition: To burn slightly or superficially so as to affect colour.
One of the several species of fishes of the genus Salvelinus.
definitions.example: Among other native delicacies, they give you fresh char.

definitions.definition: A time; a turn or occasion.
A turn of work; a labour or item of business.
An odd job, a chore or piece of housework.
A charlady, a woman employed to do housework; cleaning lady.
definitions.example: I had to scrub the kitchen today, because the char couldn't come.

definitions.definition: To turn, especially away or aside.
To work, especially to do housework; to work by the day, without being a regularly hired servant.
To perform; to do; to finish.
A character (text element such as a letter or symbol).
